field.name: lifetime
field.label: cache lifetime

field.name: clear_routes
field.label: clear routes
field.description: Comma seperated list of routes to reset the cache on if an article is saved. Routes should be written relative to your document root, i.e. '/news/list,/archive' Leave empty to disable.
